column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The food itself took at least 35 minutes to get to us (we were slowly turning to starving statues and made us late to our movie) and I grabbed flustered kid again and begged him to check on our food. (It wasn't busy
column2: wtf was going on?!) He said "oh right
column4: I'll go see if it's ready" lol like as if he forgot we were there to eat. It was warm
column6: so obviously was sitting there for awhile while we died of neglect lol.
